articles.author: Elena Giordano
articles.title: Simion’s Romanian election win sparks right-wing jubilation around Europe - politico.eu
articles.description: “Excellent result,” cheers former Polish PM Mateusz Morawiecki.
articles.content: In Romania the people finally voted, freely, with their heads and hearts. With all due respect to the gentlemen of Brussels and their dirty tricks. Bravo George Simion! said Italys Deputy Prime Minis… [+755 chars]
